game.name: Slingbox
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Slingbox는 정밀함과 모멘텀이 전부인 미니멀리즘 2D 물리 기반 플랫폼 게임입니다. 대시와 로프를 마스터해 흔들고, 날아가고, 추상적인 스테이지를 질주하세요. 시간을 이기고, 메달을 얻으며, 완벽을 추구하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slingbox is a minimalist, physics-based 2D platformer where precision and momentum are everything. Master your dash and rope mechanics to swing, launch and race through clean abstract levels. Beat the clock, earn medals and chase perfection.
